CustomField.description: Show 'Alert' If Next_Annual_Review_Date < Today and Next three months
CustomField.formula: If (Next_Annual_Review_Date__c <= today(), 'Alert', If (Year(Next_Annual_Review_Date__c) = Year(Today()), If ((Month(Next_Annual_Review_Date__c) - Month(Today())) <= 3, 'Alert', NULL ) , If((Month(Today()) - Month(Next_Annual_Review_Date__c)) >= 9 , 'Alert',NULL)))
CustomField.label: Alert Flag
